ingredients.ingredient: 2 tablespoons nonfat plain yogurt (such as Mountain High®)
½ clove garlic, crushed, or to taste
1 teaspoon crushed dried mint, or to taste

cookingTips: Salt the diced cucumber and let it sit briefly to remove excess moisture
Crush garlic fresh rather than using minced for more authentic flavor
Add mint just before serving to preserve its fresh aroma
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How can I prevent this yogurt-based salad from becoming watery after it's been made?
